abstract: They say tragedy comes in threes
description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop "Journeys with Breast Cancer" Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. "They say tragedy comes in threes, my mum's cancer, my brother's accident and now me."
